last_episode_to_air.name: Who We Really Are
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Midge’s power grows stronger than ever, Mia and the group stage a dark and daring mission in hopes of stopping her once and for all.

name: The A List
overview: Romance, rivalry and radical mystery collide as a group of teens attend a remote island sleepaway camp in this suspenseful, supernatural drama.

episodes.name: Here She Is At Last
episodes.overview: Mia arrives at camp ready to take her place as Queen Bee, but is challenged by mysterious new arrival, Amber. Their instant rivalry causes tension and things take a sinister turn.

episodes.name: Take Back Control
episodes.overview: After the disturbing antics at the picnic, Mia's determined to get herself or Amber sent home.  Foiled at first, she tries a new approach. Meanwhile, a new threat lurks in the woods.

episodes.name: To Become A Queen
episodes.overview: When the ballot opens for Midsummer Queen, Mia spots an opportunity to dethrone Amber by forming a new alliance. Out in the woods, friendship blossoms for Alex.

episodes.name: Capture The King
episodes.overview: As the Midsummer Party rages on, things take a dark turn. Sparks fly, tears are spilled and more than one heart is broken before the night is through.

episodes.name: In For The Kill
episodes.overview: Alex & Petal delve deeper into the island and uncover a new mystery. Mia attempts to move on from her rivalry with Amber only to learn just how powerful Amber truly is.

episodes.name: Far From Home
episodes.overview: Harry faces a steep challenge, and finds support in Petal. Mia and Alex reach out for help and end up getting a message from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: Nothing Can Survive Alone
episodes.overview: Amber lands her cruellest blow yet to Mia. She celebrates in her cabin with a select few but things soon spin out of control. Alex & Petal grow closer.

episodes.name: All That's Left Of Us
episodes.overview: Dev makes a timely discovery that leads him to ask dangerous questions. Mia, Alex and Harry unearth a potential way to stop Amber - if they can figure out what it means.

episodes.name: Who You Used To Be
episodes.overview: Mia, Alex and Harry must decide whether or not to trust a potential new ally who could provide them with vital information. Kayleigh learns the true cost of Amber’s favour.

episodes.name: Poison
episodes.overview: Harry makes a rash decision that puts him in Amber’s crosshairs. Dev reflects on recent events and comes to a disturbing conclusion. Someone unexpected joins Amber’s inner circle.

episodes.name: What You Left Behind
episodes.overview: Tensions with Amber reach breaking point and an innocent pays the price. As Amber sleeps, nightmares become reality and a shocking truth is revealed that changes everything.

episodes.name: Run, Mia, Run
episodes.overview: Mia makes a final attempt to leave the island and escape Amber, who has more acolytes than ever. Mia turns to Luka for help, leading to some heart-breaking consequences

episodes.name: The Last Dove
episodes.overview: As her allies start to fall, Mia goes to face Amber head on, believing her own surrender will ensure their escape. But Amber has one last surprise.

episodes.name: A Second Chance
episodes.overview: Safe at home, Mia recovers from her camp trauma — until she receives an unexpected message. Elsewhere, others work to escape a high-security facility.

episodes.name: You Don't Remember Me
episodes.overview: Mia, Petal and Harry officially start their journey with a new ally. In isolation, Midge makes a surprising connection. Amber keeps everyone guessing.

episodes.name: Two Birds, One Stone
episodes.overview: As the journey continues, Mia faces a major decision and holds Petal’s fate in her hands. Meanwhile, Midge navigates her new not-so-normal.

episodes.name: We Were Never Friends
episodes.overview: Past meets present as Midge reminds Mia of their history as friends… and enemies. Jenna and Fitz search for Harry and uncover a chilling secret.

episodes.name: We Deserve Each Other
episodes.overview: Midge addresses the group, sparking a new wave of skepticism. Alex, Petal and Kayleigh examine Dr. Shore's records. Mia and Luka forge a new bond.

episodes.name: Because of Who I Am
episodes.overview: After Alex dives deeper into her research, the group prepares a new plan of action. Mia and Luka revisit their pasts. Amber connects with a visitor.

episodes.name: Save Them
episodes.overview: Tensions mount as Mia, Amber and Midge meet again. Elsewhere, Dev crosses paths — and exchanges words — with Luka. Sam serves as a voice of reason.

episodes.name: Who We Really Are
episodes.overview: As Midge’s power grows stronger than ever, Mia and the group stage a dark and daring mission in hopes of stopping her once and for all.
